name: Battle Slime
description:
NOTE: This game is in very very early development, the only features so far are player movement/shooting and enemy movement/spawning. There are many more features planned to be added and are in development. Description:

You are a part of a technologically advanced race of slime that is locked in a war with another race of slime. The enemy slime are not a technologically advances as you but they are more of them. You have to fight them off as much as you can and get stronger by upgrading your equipment, while at the same time they get stronger. How long can you survive? 

How To Play:

Use the wasd keys to move and the left/right arrow keys to rotate left/right. Press space to shoot(rotating left/right using the arrow keys to aim). Shoot and destroy the enemies(it takes 5 hits to destroy an enemy). Just be careful not to let one of them touch you. You can press Esc at any time during the game(even after you die) to reset the game.

Planned Features:
  • art(the colored squares are temporary)
  • sound
  • menus
  • better worlds(worlds that have walls instead of just one large open area)
  • enemy variety(ranged attackers, fast attackers)
  • upgrades
  • enemies getting stronger
  • and much more

This is the first actual game I have ever made(not including a very small thing i made while watching a tutorial series) so your feedback would be greatly appreciated.
